description: Dara Calleary rejects Green Party criticism that deal for government would hurt the most vulnerable.
title: Irish government: Deal is 'best option' says Fianna F¨¢il
title_page: Irish government: Deal is 'best option' says Fianna F¨¢il - BBC News
maintext: "While there are significant gains and some wins in terms of environmental action - particularly around energy and the banning of imported fracking gas - it doesn't provide the other systemic changes we would hope to see in terms of the economic model issues, the income for taxation and also the social changes - particularly on health care and housing - we would have hoped to have seen," he said.
